cast.name: 列昂尼德·比切文 Leonid Bichevin
茵娜·丘里科娃 Inna Churikova
亚历山大·拉扎列夫 Aleksandr Lazarev Ml.
伊琳娜·梅德韦德娃 Irina Medvedeva

director.name: 安德烈·索可洛夫 Andrei Sokolov

introduction: It is adapted from Alexander Zviajintsev's play The Last Idol. After his death, his family left the country, reportedly because of the end of his power. The last few hours before leaving - cost, trouble, confusion... Under such circumstances of force majeure, pressure, through the attitude towards the fact of leaving, the prism of the existence of the house itself, and the relationship between the family itself, it turns out that relatives do not know each other, they have completely different life values, and they are driven out of the villa by their closest friends, The most loyal people are those we don't usually notice.
